short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will check if a website is known to spread misinformation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time you visit a website, the extension automatically checks if it is misinformation or trustworthy. The icon the changes color accordingly (red -> fake news, orange -> unknown, green -> trustworthy).
